Difficulty Notes: Testing the edge-cases of the mermaid card. In this setting note that the mermaid cannot place onto the sacrificial pit in a meaningful way.
Question: Assume all other players have already passed. Given this game state, what is the maximum guaranteed net number of VP the player can gain in two actions?Output the answer as: Previous amount: <num>, New amount: <num>
Rationale: The routes to gaining more points are to obtain a PoP or monument, or to activate sacrificial pit. However player does not have enough resources for these options. Therefore they can't get any VP in one turn. Similarly with two actions, there still are not enough resources to make anything happen.
